properties.name: PROMPT_CONFIGURATION_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom JSON file which contains the classes and associated prompts that will be sent to LLaVA.

properties.name: JSON_PROMPT_CONFIGURATION_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom JSON file which contains classes and prompts that specify LLaVA to return a JSON object.

properties.name: ENABLE_JSON_PROMPT_FORMAT
properties.description: Enables returning a JSON formatted response from LLaVA, with the prompt specified at PROMPT_JSON_CONFIGURATION_PATH job property.

properties.name: GENERATE_FRAME_RATE_CAP
properties.description: Get description from other FRAME_RATE_CAP property

actions.name: LLAVA DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for each video frame passed in.

actions.name: LLAVA DETECTION (WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) ACTION
LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for the class of the feed forward detection passed in.

actions.name: LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) ACTION

tasks.name: LLAVA DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for each video frame passed in.

tasks.name: LLAVA DETECTION (WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) TASK
tasks.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for each video frame passed in.
actions: LLAVA DETECTION (WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) ACTION

tasks.name: LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts for the class of the detection passed in.
actions: LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION) ACTION

tasks.name: LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) TASK
actions: LLAVA DETECTION (EXEMPLAR ONLY WITH FF REGION AND JSON PROMPT) ACTION

pipelines.name: LLAVA DETECTION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts on images and videos at the specified frame rate.

pipelines.description: Runs LLaVA with prompts on images and videos at the specified frame rate.
